name: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2019
description: Take control as head coach of your favorite college basketball team. All new in game adjustments make it feel even more like you're really on the sidelines. Evaluate your team with an amazing array of stats, pour over detailed scouting reports and in game media and make the decisions that will lead you to tournament glory. Challenge yourself by starting at a small school and work your way up to a prestigious job or play in the all new sandbox mode and switch to any new team each season! The most detailed recruiting engine of any college game will give you a challenge in bringing in new players season after season and watch those players go on to pro careers by exporting them for use in Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2019.
